LayoutSetting.title: Layout settings
LayoutSetting.note: Note: This setting is only valid for pages that have no layout set or are set to follow the system, and the layout set by the menu has the highest priority.

user.inspiration: A person can almost succeed in anything he has unlimited enthusiasm for.

welcome.title: ‚ú® Welcome to Vue Naive Admin 2.0
welcome.websiteInDevelopment: The website is under rapid development...
welcome.description: This is a minimalist style backend management template that includes both frontend and backend solutions. The frontend uses Vite + Vue3 + Pinia + Unocss, and the backend uses Nestjs + TypeOrm + MySql. It's simple, easy to use, visually appealing, and has gone through numerous refactors and refinements, full of sincerity!!

features.title: üíØ Features
features.headerExtra: üëè After dozens of refactors and detail polish
features.usingVite: Mainstream tech stack: Vite + Vue3 + Pinia
features.lightweightAndElegant: Framework: Unocss, elegant, lightweight, easy to use
features.customIconsSupport: Icon scheme, supporting custom icons and dynamic rendering
features.naiveUIFeatures: Minimalistic code style and refreshing page design
features.advancedFileStructure: Advanced and easy-to-understand file structure design, with zero coupling between modules
features.deleteModulesNoImpact: Deleting a single business module does not affect other modules
features.componentsAsPages: Each component can be a page, solving the issue of multi-level routes with KeepAlive difficulty
features.dynamicPermissionRoutes: Dynamically generate routes based on permissions
features.securityAndExperience: User login state is controllable, security and experience are equally important
features.globalToolMethod: Global tool methods, supporting batch reminders and cross-page shared instances
features.naiveUIComponents: Naive UI encapsulation of common business components, including
features.modalComponent: Modal component, reducing a lot of repetitive work
features.viewMore: See more useful features in continuous development...

403.title: 403 Forbidden
403.tips: Sorry, You Do Not Have Permission to Access. Please Contact the Administrator to Grant Access.

404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.tips: Life Always Has a Touch of Absurdity

resource.name: Name
resource.title: Title
resource.codeContent: If it is a menu, it corresponds to the front-end route's name, using PascalCase
resource.limitation: Must start with /, http, or https
resource.iconContent: e.g., material-symbols:help, icon library URL: https://icones.js.org/collection/all
resource.layoutsContent: Corresponds to the directory name under layouts, defaults to 'default' if empty
resource.componentContent: Front-end component path, starting with /src, optional for parent menus
resource.showContent: Controls whether to display in the menu bar, does not affect route registration
resource.enableContent: If it is a menu, disabling it will remove it from the route table, making the page inaccessible
resource.keepAliveContent: To set keepAlive, the component's name must match the current menu's code
resource.noCurrentMenu: Please select a menu to view details

user.warning: Details to be completed and modified by the user
